# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Create an instance of the WebSocket protocol.

## Declaration

```swift
init<BelowProtocol>(@ProtocolStackBuilder<BelowProtocol> _ builder: () -> BelowProtocol) where BelowProtocol : StreamProtocol
```

## Parameters

- **builder**: The protocol stack below WebSocket.
